briefTitle: Ocriplasmin for Treatment for Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion Including Macular Hole
officialTitle: A Randomized, Sham-controlled, Double-masked, Multicenter Study Evaluating Ocriplasmin Treatment for Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion Including Macular Hole
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the treatment of symptomatic vitreomacular adhesion / (VMT) including macular hole with ocriplasmin.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Subjects With Pharmacological Vitreomacular Adhesion (VMA) / (Vitreomacular Traction [VMT]) Resolution at Day 28
